author: haich
post_text: July 18, 2016 at 8:43 PM#1Is there a way to execute the "half" or "double" command when using theEffectHZkeyword?Thanks!

posts.author: haich
posts.post_text: July 18, 2016 at 8:43 PM#1Is there a way to execute the "half" or "double" command when using theEffectHZkeyword?Thanks!

posts.author: Duplicate bentoylight
posts.post_text: July 21, 2016 at 11:22 AM#2You can do :effecthz *2 for double and effecthz *0.5 for half

title: EffectHZ "Half" or "Double" by Macro
